CustomField.description: When enabled, if a survey is assigned to a lead or contact as a recipient and the recipient record Email Opt Out field is set to true, do not send email notification.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When enabled, if a survey is assigned to a Lead or Contact recipient and the Email Opt Out field is set to true in the recipient's record, no email notification will be sent. This setting respects the recipient's preference to opt out of email communications, ensuring compliance with their choices and avoiding sending unwanted emails.
CustomField.label: Respect Email Opt-Out
